Class Question

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.tools.Entity
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Question
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Entity>
public class Question extends Entity
Represents a question in the examination system. This class encapsulates the details of a question, including its content, options, correct answer, type, score, and a reference ID.
See Also:

    • Question

      public Question(String questionContent, String optionA, String optionB, String optionC, String optionD, String answer, String type, String score, String referID)
      Constructs a Question with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      questionContent - The content of the question.
      optionA - The text for option A.
      optionB - The text for option B.
      optionC - The text for option C.
      optionD - The text for option D.
      answer - The correct answer to the question.
      type - The type of the question.
      score - The score associated with the question.
      referID - The reference ID for the question.

    • Question

      public Question(String questionContent, String optionA, String optionB, String optionC, String optionD, String answer, String type, String score)
      Constructs a Question with the specified details, defaulting the reference ID to "0".
      Parameters:
      questionContent - The content of the question.
      optionA - The text for option A.
      optionB - The text for option B.
      optionC - The text for option C.
      optionD - The text for option D.
      answer - The correct answer to the question.
      type - The type of the question.
      score - The score associated with the question.
